name: places/ChIJmyU_60lZwokRmg9ITh6hvZE
adrFormatAddress: 302 Bowery, New York, NY 10012-2855, USA

originalText.text: This shop truly embodies the adage "don't judge a book by its cover." With its sophisticated interior, there's no need to feel intimidated; the staff is incredibly accommodating and welcoming. I had a delightful experience as they patiently took note of my preferences for a travel souvenir from my visit to NYC, demonstrating thoughtfulness towards my budget. The overall concept of their shop is meticulously planned, right down to its strategic location on Bowery, which holds great significance in Tattoo history. Also love the fact that it is women owned! More power ladies!

originalText.text: LINES is ah-mazing!! Humble yet inspiringly women-owned, emphasizing& showcasing the importance of local businesses, diversity & talent. Love that they support local works from artists & hand crafted designs, especially Freja bags. I not only had my special cousins tattoo done here (which was fantastic & pain free) thanks to THE Crystal Pfeifer, LINE‚ÄôS own Co-Founder, but also have come here for numerous events; most recently the figure drawing classes. They do offer walk in tattoos, but highly recommended booking as they‚Äôre quite popular, but regardless stop by! They‚Äôre all super welcoming! Definitely recommend checking out their site for upcoming activities & special events, as I‚Äôm sure you‚Äôll be glad to have come across them! ü´∂üèª you LINES team üñ§

originalText.text:
I recently had the pleasure of getting a tattoo at Lines and I can't express how thrilled I am with the entire experience. Crystal worked her magic and created a masterpiece with my customized tiger tattoo. I also purchased the Lines Tattoo Aftercare products and highly recommend. The organic blends healed my tattoo so quickly!

While getting my tattoo I was admiring the beautiful Death Valley landscape photography by Sergio Kurhajec AND being serenaded by Joanna's sitar practice. This was definitely the most unique, yet peaceful tattoo experience I've ever endured.

The shop's fusion with a fashion showroom adds a unique touch, providing a trendy and stylish backdrop to the tattoo experience. Not only can you walk-in for a custom tattoo, but also shop local sustainable designers (including my brand Spicie!)

Whether you're a seasoned tattoo enthusiast or a first-timer, Lines Tattoo Shop and Fashion Showroom is the place to be. Crystal, Jiwon and the entire team have created a haven for art and self-expression, and I wholeheartedly recommend their services.

originalText.text:
Amazing space and phenomenal tattoo artists- they accommodate walk in tattoo appointments which is unusual for a shop with this caliber of artists!
They can do virtually any style of tattoo to excellence. Even their flash choices are elevated-
It‚Äôs truly a hidden gem. (I think it‚Äôs been open less than a year.)
They have artwork, clothing and handbags- even indie tarot decks- all from amazing artists.
There‚Äôs an event space downstairs that is absolutely magical- they host vogue classes and tea ceremonies as well as art exhibits and even tarot nights.
Pop up vendor events  are a recurring theme here too- I love this place.
An interesting and inviting place with beautiful and talented people.
Stop in for a tattoo or shopping or a unique workshop experience.
Also, super conducive to meeting new people, I met several the last time I stopped in.
The atmosphere is warm and social with lots of interesting artists of all mediums.
Love Love Love
Loads of bars and restaurants in the area too- Definitely a must if you‚Äôre in the area.

originalText.text: I got a tattoo done here by Niall, and he‚Äôs the best!! His attention to detail is phenomenal. I got the painting Judith Slaying Holofernes by Artemesia Gentileschi tattooed, and he freehanded all of the shading! It looks amazing and I couldn‚Äôt be happier with it. We also had great conversations over the 3 tattoo sessions. The entire staff is also so friendly and welcoming, and they‚Äôre so supportive of eachother and their work!! The owner is also so nice, and she has some amazing artwork and clothes on display. The vibes here are immaculate and I would recommend anyone in the area stop in and check it out! I wish I could rate it 6/5 stars!
